edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.cs56_games_maze

Class MazeGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.cs56_games_maze.MazeGui
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MazeGui
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Class where the MazeGui is constructed. This is also the main class and contains the main method
    Version:
    2/26/15 for proj1, cs56, W15
    Author:
    Jake Staahl, Evan West, Logan Ortega, Richard Wang, Zak Blake
